hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (PEPE/DOGE) 15-Minute Volatility Spike Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: When PEPE or DOGE experiences a 15-minute price move > 8% on volume > 3x average during NEUTRAL regimes, fading the move (opposite direction) yields positive returns within 90 minutes as retail momentum fades.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins exhibit high retail-driven volatility in neutral markets where no clear trend exists. Extreme short-term moves often overextend due to social media hype and thin order books, creating quick reversion opportunities. The 'trading games' research suggests such inefficiencies persist despite ETF growth draining alpha from traditional strategies.
entry_conditions: Move occurs during US/EU trading hours (8:00-20:00 UTC)
No major news catalyst for specific coin

exit_conditions.take_profit: 50% retracement of the initial spike OR 4% gain

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Spikes continue in same direction > 60% of the time with average continuation > 5% beyond entry point.
